content.question: Answer all parts of the question that follows. a) Identify ONE way in which ethnic divisions affected the development of land-based empires in the period 1450–1750. b) Identify ONE way in which ethnic divisions affected the development of maritime empires in the period 1450–1750. c) Explain ONE similarity in the way that land-based and maritime empires adopted policies to accommodate the ethnic diversity of their populations in the period 1450–1750.
